AUTHOR: SML
INSTALL_MSG:
Thank you for install the SML Cogs Repo! These cogs are in constant development. Please update regularly to get the latest additions. If you wish to post an issue please do so on my github:
https://github.com/smlbiobot/SML-Cogs
NAME: SML Cogs
SHORT: Clash Royale utility cogs + clan management
DESCRIPTION: Most of these cogs are developed specifically for the Reddit Alpha Clan Family (RACF), a Global top 10 clan in Clash Royale. Some features may be useful for other Discord servers. Install at your own risk. SML cannot provide any support but you are free to post issues on the Github.
